name: The Martian Investigations: Case 2
description:
Runner Up: Best Game Narrative at the 2016 Imirt Awards.

When an enormous explosion rips through the Banks Settlement's mining operations, it is down to Detective Hayley Bendis to get to the bottom of things. And this means delving twelve kilometers under the surface of the red planet, to a world of angry industrial workers, dark tunnels, and unchecked revenge.

Deep Fears challenges the players to step into the shoes of Hayley Bendis and use their own wits to solve the case. The game is suitable for between 1 and 5 players.

Deep Fears is the second case in the popular Martian Investigations series and has been designed so that you don't need to print anything to play - you can play it on your screen. However, in order to play, you must have first played Case 1, available here.
